content: Isn’t this entire article hypocritical? People put effort into re-designs in order to drive a conversation about the pros & cons of the current UI. So yes, obviously a lot of them are worse than the existing, and outsiders are obviously not privy to internal business goals. But hosting a conversation about new ideas is completely valid, and actually quite integral to the design community at large. In this article you both engage in that dialogue/process and simultaneously dismiss it as worthless. Strange.
